mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_seq, pet_id, challenge_id, category_id, checkup_gubun, result_id, score, complete_at, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm FROM t_member_challenge WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_member_challenge (member_seq, pet_id, challenge_id, category_id, checkup_gubun, result_id, score, complete_at, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm) VALUES (#{member_seq}, #{pet_id}, #{challenge_id}, #{category_id}, #{checkup_gubun}, #{result_id}, #{score}, #{complete_at}, #{chk_at}, #{del_at}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_member_challenge SET member_seq = #{memberSeq}, pet_id = #{petId}, challenge_id = #{challengeId}, category_id = #{categoryId}, checkup_gubun = #{checkupGubun}, result_id = #{resultId}, score = #{score}, complete_at = #{completeAt}, chk_at = #{chkAt}, del_at = #{delAt} WHERE seq = #{seq}
